data.eml:eml: Oxalis simplicifolia (Oxalidaceae), an unusual new unifoliolate species from the Marquesas Islands (French Polynesia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lorence, David H., Wagner, Warren L. (2011): Oxalis simplicifolia (Oxalidaceae), an unusual new unifoliolate species from the Marquesas Islands (French Polynesia). PhytoKeys 4: 53-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.4.1604, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.4.1604
